rules.build:
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR"
DISTDIR="`pwd`/dist" CFLAGS="$CFLAGS -Wall -pipe" MACHINE="`echo $BOLT_HOST_TYPE | cut -d'-' -f1`"
if [ "`bh_os_bits $BOLT_HOST_TYPE`" = "64" ]; then EXTRA_FLAGS="USE_64=1" else EXTRA_FLAGS="USE_64=0" fi
make -C nss/coreconf/nsinstall \ SOURCE_PREFIX="$DISTDIR" \ SOURCE_MD_DIR="$DISTDIR" \ DIST="$DISTDIR" \ OBJDIR_NAME=OBJS \ OS_TEST="$MACHINE" \ KERNEL=linux \ ARCHFLAG= \ CC="${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-gcc" \ CXX="${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-g++" \ CCC="${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-g++" \ RANLIB="${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-ranlib" \ AR="${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-ar cr \$@" \ $EXTRA_FLAGS
make -C nss \ all \ SOURCE_PREFIX="$DISTDIR" \ SOURCE_MD_DIR="$DISTDIR" \ DIST="$DISTDIR" \ OBJDIR_NAME=OBJS \ OS_TEST="$MACHINE" \ KERNEL=linux \ ARCHFLAG= \ CC="${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-gcc" \ CXX="${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-g++" \ CCC="${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-g++" \ RANLIB="${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-ranlib" \ AR="${BOLT_HOST_TYPE}-ar cr \$@" \ MOZILLA_CLIENT=1 \ NSPR_INCLUDE_DIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/include/nspr" \ NSPR_LIB_DIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/" \ BUILD_OPT=1 \ NS_USE_GCC=1 \ OPTIMIZER="$CFLAGS $CPPFLAGS" \ LDFLAGS="$LDFLAGS \$(ARCHFLAG) \$(ZDEFS_FLAG)" \ DSO_LDOPTS="-shared \$(LDFLAGS)" \ NSS_USE_SYSTEM_SQLITE=1 \ NSS_ENABLE_ECC=1 \ CHECKLOC= \ $EXTRA_FLAGS
rules.install:
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR"
DISTDIR="`pwd`/dist" NSS_TOOLS=" certutil chktest cmsutil crlutil derdump httpserv modutil ocspclnt p7content p7env p7sign p7verify pk12util pk1sign pwdecrypt rsaperf selfserv shlibsign signtool signver ssltap strsclnt symkeyutil tstclnt vfychain vfyserv"
# directories install -m 755 -d \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/nss" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/pkgconfig" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/include/nss" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/include/nss/private"
# libraries install -m 644 "$DISTDIR/lib/libnss3.so" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/libnss3.so" install -m 644 "$DISTDIR/lib/libnssutil3.so" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/libnssutil3.so" install -m 644 "$DISTDIR/lib/libsmime3.so" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/libsmime3.so" install -m 644 "$DISTDIR/lib/libssl3.so" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/libssl3.so"
install -m 644 "$DISTDIR/lib/libfreebl3.so" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/nss/libfreebl3.so" install -m 644 "$DISTDIR/lib/libfreeblpriv3.so" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/nss/libfreeblpriv3.so" install -m 644 "$DISTDIR/lib/libsoftokn3.so" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/nss/libsoftokn3.so" install -m 644 "$DISTDIR/lib/libnssdbm3.so" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/nss/libnssdbm3.so" install -m 644 "$DISTDIR/lib/libnssckbi.so" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/nss/libnssckbi.so"
# these are needed to compile nss-pem install -m 644 "$DISTDIR/lib/libcrmf.a" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/libcrmf.a" install -m 644 "$DISTDIR/lib/libfreebl.a" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/libfreebl.a" install -m 644 "$DISTDIR/lib/libnssb.a" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/libnssb.a" install -m 644 "$DISTDIR/lib/libnssckfw.a" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/libnssckfw.a"
# header files install -m 644 "$DISTDIR"/public/nss/* "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/include/nss/" install -m 644 "$DISTDIR"/private/nss/* "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/include/nss/private"
# executables for TOOL in $NSS_TOOLS; do install -m 755 "$DISTDIR/bin/$TOOL" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/$TOOL" done for TOOL in addbuiltin dbtest pp; do install -m 755 "$DISTDIR/bin/$TOOL" "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/nss-$TOOL" done
